short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Grab all image links from webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extract image links from webpage with a single click. Just open the page and click on app icon, voila you got the links.

Update 0.4
Extension requires API Key after 10 free runs.
